src:
Neznanci na Škofijah razstrelili bankomat

06 Nov 2019, 07:18


Škofije, 6. novembra - Neznanci so na Škofijah okoli 4.30 razstrelili bankomat in pobegnili. Policisti in kriminalisti intenzivno zbirajo informacije in opravljajo ogled kraja, so sporočili s Policijske uprave Koper.



Izlake. Policijski trak.Foto: Daniel Novakovič/STA Arhiv STA

Policija prosi vse, ki bi v tem času kaj videli, slišali ali opazili sumljiva vozila in osebe, da to čim prej sporočijo na 113 ali na anonimni telefon policije 080 1200.
text:
Strangers in Diocese blow up ATM

06 Nov 2019, 07:18


Dioceses, November 6 - A stranger blows up an ATM at Diocese around 4.30am and escapes. Police officers and criminals are intensively gathering information and conducting a tour of the place, the Koper Police Directorate said.



Exodus. Police tape.Photo: Daniel Novakovic / STA

Police are asking anyone who would see, hear or notice any suspicious vehicles or persons in the meantime to report it to 113 as soon as possible or to the police anonymous telephone number 080 1200.
